com.adp.marketplace.connection.core

Class AuthorizationCodeConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adp.marketplace.connection.core.AuthorizationCodeConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ADPAPIConnection

    public class AuthorizationCodeConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements ADPAPIConnection

    AuthorizationCodeConnection is an implementation of ADPAPIConnection with GrantType authorization_code.

    AuthorizationCodeConnection exposes the common methods that are available for processing a authorization connection request

    Author:
    tallaprs
    See Also:
    AuthorizationCodeConnection, ClientCredentialsConnection

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws ConnectionException
        Initiates a connect request to ADP Authorization Server on the type of connection configuration. Validations are performed on the connection configurations and if request is valid access token will be issued and Token is mapped with this connection. In case of error, connection exceptions are thrown or error details are returned
        Specified by:
        connect in interface ADPAPIConnection
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - exception thrown when validation fails on configuration and connection

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
                throws ConnectionException
        Invokes API to disconnect the connection - currently this method is implemented to reset the connection to null.
        Specified by:
        disconnect in interface ADPAPIConnection
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - throws exceptions in the event of object

      • getAuthorizationUrl

        public java.lang.String getAuthorizationUrl()
                                     throws ConnectionException
        Returns Authorization Url after building it from configuration
        Returns:
        String authorization Url authorization Url for redirect
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - throws exception if connection configuration is null

      • isConnectionIndicator

        public boolean isConnectionIndicator()
        Returns true or false based on the validation or access token.
        Specified by:
        isConnectionIndicator in interface ADPAPIConnection
        Returns:
        boolean returns true when token is valid and not expired
